articles.description: TikTok played an integral role in his defamation trial—now Depp himself has joined the cacophony of memes.
articles.content: For the past nine weeks, Johnny Depp was TikTok. And TikTok was Johnny Depp. Now, after just one post thanking his fandom, his new account has more than 12 million followers. If the defamation suit t… [+3781 chars]
